complex.title: Map Chart
complex.text: This is a map showing total cumulative COVID case counts. Your turn: Hover over the map to see the data for the corresponding state.

complex.title: Legend
complex.text:
This is the legend, showing how the colors correspond to case counts

That's it, have fun exploring the data!
